2023 年 12 月 8 日星期五 14:03:03 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
AGI 的变革潜力——以及它何时到来 |肖恩·莱格和克里斯·安德森肖恩·莱格和克里斯·安德森As the cofounder of Google DeepMind, Shane Legg is driving one of the greatest transformations in history: the development of artificial general intelligence (AGI). He envisions a system with human-like intelligence that would be exponentially smarter than today's AI, with limitless possibilities and applications. In conversation with head of TED Chris Anderson, Legg explores the evolution of AGI, what the world might look like when it arrives — and how to ensure it's built safely and ethically. AGI 的变革潜力——以及它何时到来 |肖恩·莱格和克里斯·安德森As the cofounder of Google DeepMind, Shane Legg is driving one of the greatest transformations in history: the development of artificial general intelligence (AGI). He envisions a system with human-like intelligence that would be exponentially smarter than today's AI, with limitless possibilities and applications. In conversation with head of TED Chris Anderson, Legg explores the evolution of AGI, what the world might look like when it arrives — and how to ensure it's built safely and ethically. https://www.ted.com/talks/shane_legg_and_chris_anderson_the_transformative_pottial_of_agi_and_when_it_might_arrive?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:121113 121113 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 22:02:01 +0000高等教育不00:16:07泰德
AI的单点故障|罗布·托斯罗布·托斯"The world's most important advanced technology is nearly all produced in a single facility," says AI expert Rob Toews. He describes how one company in Taiwan, TSMC, manufactures nearly all the most advanced semiconductor chips — a crucial technology that powers everything from phones to electric vehicles to next-generation artificial intelligence — and breaks down how geopolitical tensions in the region could paralyze the global field of AI. AI的单点故障|罗布·托斯"The world's most important advanced technology is nearly all produced in a single facility," says AI expert Rob Toews. He describes how one company in Taiwan, TSMC, manufactures nearly all the most advanced semiconductor chips — a crucial technology that powers everything from phones to electric vehicles to next-generation artificial intelligence — and breaks down how geopolitical tensions in the region could paralyze the global field of AI. https://www.ted.com/talks/rob_toews_ai_s_single_point_of_failure?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:120762 120762 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 19:17:11 +0000高等教育不00:11:30泰德
人工智能能发现医生漏掉的东西吗？ |埃里克·托波尔埃里克·托波尔AI could propel the biggest transformation in the history of medicine, says physician-scientist Eric Topol. He explains how sophisticated AI models can interpret medical images as well or better than human experts can — and, beyond that, even pick up things that human eyes can't see. Learn all the ways AI is poised to make a difference for both patients and doctors.人工智能能发现医生漏掉的东西吗？ |埃里克·托波尔AI could propel the biggest transformation in the history of medicine, says physician-scientist Eric Topol. He explains how sophisticated AI models can interpret medical images as well or better than human experts can — and, beyond that, even pick up things that human eyes can't see. Learn all the ways AI is poised to make a difference for both patients and doctors. https://www.ted.com/talks/eric_topol_can_ai_catch_what_doctors_miss?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:120982 120982 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 15:59:24 +0000高等教育不00:14:02泰德
AI时代的营销将会发生什么？ |杰西卡·李艾科杰西卡·李艾科Generative AI is poised to transform the workplace, but we still need human brains for new ideas, says marketing expert Jessica Apotheker. She explores how marketers can find their niche in the world of AI based on their preference for data or creativity, offering a pragmatic and hopeful look at the future of business. AI时代的营销将会发生什么？ |杰西卡·李艾科Generative AI is poised to transform the workplace, but we still need human brains for new ideas, says marketing expert Jessica Apotheker. 如何在生活的荒谬中找到幽默|迈拉·卡尔曼迈拉·卡尔曼With levity and profound insight, artist Maira Kalman reflects on life, death, dinner parties, not knowing the right answers, the joys of eating a hot dog from a street vendor and more. This talk, interwoven with her delightful paintings, is itself an artwork that seems to hold the entirety of life in all its absurd glory.如何在生活的荒谬中找到幽默|迈拉·卡尔曼With levity and profound insight, artist Maira Kalman reflects on life, death, dinner parties, not knowing the right answers, the joys of eating a hot dog from a street vendor and more. 如何阻止下一次大流行？停止砍伐森林|尼尔·沃拉尼尔·沃拉Clearing tropical forests isn't just dangerous to the natural world — it's also a threat to human health and wellbeing, says physician Neil Vora. Tracing how environmental devastation led to deadly epidemics like Ebola, he presents three ways deforestation unleashes disease and calls on each of us to help preserve the delicate ecological balance we depend upon.如何阻止下一次大流行？停止砍伐森林|尼尔·沃拉Clearing tropical forests isn't just dangerous to the natural world — it's also a threat to human health and wellbeing, says physician Neil Vora. 民主是有效的——我们只是需要更好的领导者林迪维·马兹布科林迪维·马兹布科South Africa transitioned to democracy in the 1990s with a visionary constitution, but the promises of that constitution are largely unfulfilled to this day. Public leader Lindiwe Mazibuko explores how poor leadership failed to deliver a better life for the country's citizens — and shares her mission to cultivate a new generation of ethical leaders who can revitalize democracy in South Africa and beyond.民主是有效的——我们只是需要更好的领导者林迪维·马兹布科South Africa transitioned to democracy in the 1990s with a visionary constitution, but the promises of that constitution are largely unfulfilled to this day. 气候解决方案融资手册 |尼利·吉尔伯特和大卫·布拉德尼利·吉尔伯特和大卫·布拉德Tackling climate change costs a lot of money — and the financial sector is key to getting that money flowing. In a wide-ranging conversation, sustainable investment leaders Nili Gilbert and David Blood discuss where progress is being made on climate solutions, where capital still needs to move faster and why this is an unprecedented opportunity for sustainable growth.气候解决方案融资手册 |尼利·吉尔伯特和大卫·布拉德Tackling climate change costs a lot of money — and the financial sector is key to getting that money flowing. 如何为 100 亿人利用丰富的清洁能源 |胡利奥·弗里德曼胡利奥·弗里德曼We can produce abundant, sustainable and cheap energy — for everyone, says physicist Julio Friedmann. He explores the infrastructure, innovation and investment needed to supply energy to 10 billion people, offering case studies from Chile's refurbished supply chain, built in partnership with Japan, to Namibia's budding clean hydrogen production, inviting us to envision a greener, more equitably powered world.如何为 100 亿人利用丰富的清洁能源 |胡利奥·弗里德曼We can produce abundant, sustainable and cheap energy — for everyone, says physicist Julio Friedmann. 我们可以破解光合作用来养活世界吗？ |史蒂夫·朗史蒂夫·朗Photosynthesis is one of the most important processes on the planet, helping produce the food we eat and the air we breathe. Crop scientist Steve Long thinks it could be more efficient — and he's intent on giving it a boost. He shows how hacking photosynthesis could help feed the world all while reducing climate change.我们可以破解光合作用来养活世界吗？ |史蒂夫·朗Photosynthesis is one of the most important processes on the planet, helping produce the food we eat and the air we breathe. 战争报道前线的生活|简·弗格森简·弗格森Covering global war stories can be hard and thankless — but it's critical work if the rest of us are to understand what's really going on in the world. For nearly two decades, journalist Jane Ferguson has reported on hostilities across Africa and the Middle East, and she's witnessed firsthand the changing face of her profession. Via stories of her own experiences at the heart of complex conflicts, she shares fascinating details of how she and other female colleagues have changed the way that news is captured, shared — and understood.战争报道前线的生活|简·弗格森Covering global war stories can be hard and thankless — but it's critical work if the rest of us are to understand what's really going on in the world. For nearly two decades, journalist Jane Ferguson has reported on hostilities across Africa and the Middle East, and she's witnessed firsthand the changing face of her profession. Via stories of her own experiences at the heart of complex conflicts, she shares fascinating details of how she and other female colleagues have changed the way that news is captured, shared — and understood. https://www.ted.com/talks/jane_ferguson_life_on_the_frontlines_of_war_reporting?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:120677 120677 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 15:45:11 +0000高等教育不00:14:15泰德
